languages.text: Вольный Торговец может приобретать предметы у представителей самых различных фракций {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}. Основными торговцами в игре являются представители 5 фракций — Друзианцы, Эксплораторы, Миссия Касбаллики, Пустотное братство и Имперский флот. С ними Вольный Торговец выстраивает взаимоотношения на протяжении всей игры. Также в игре присутствует небольшое количество специальных торговцев, не принадлежащих к фракциям.

The Rogue Trader can procure various items of interest from several factions in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The key dealers you will encounter in the game are representatives from one of five factions: the Drusians, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission, the Fellowship of the Void, and the Imperial Navy. The Rogue Trader will build business relationships with them over the course of the entire game. The game also features a small number of special merchants who are not affiliated with these five factions.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец может приобретать предметы у представителей самых различных фракций {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}. Основными торговцами в игре являются представители 5 фракций — Друзианцы, Эксплораторы, Миссия Касбаллики, Пустотное братство и Имперский флот. С ними Вольный Торговец выстраивает взаимоотношения на протяжении всей игры. Также в игре присутствует небольшое количество специальных торговцев, не принадлежащих к фракциям.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader can procure various items of interest from the various factions of the Koronus Expanse. The key dealers you will encounter in the game are the representatives of five factions: the Drusians, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission, the Fellowship of the Void, and the Merchant Fleet. The Rogue Trader will be building business relationships with them over the course of the entire game. The game also features a small number of special merchants who are not affiliated with these five factions.

The Rogue Trader can procure various items of interest from the various factions of the Koronus Expanse. The key dealers you will encounter in the game are the representatives of five factions: the Drusians, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission, the Fellowship of the Void, and the Merchant Fleet. The Rogue Trader will be building business relationships with them over the course of the entire game. The game also features a small number of special merchants who are not affiliated with these five factions.

The Rogue Trader will build business relationships with them over the course of the entire game. The game also features a small number of special merchants who are not affiliated with these five factions.

The Rogue Trader can procure various items of interest from several factions in the Koronus Expanse. The key dealers you will encounter in the game are representatives from one of five factions: the Drusians, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission, the Fellowship of the Void, and the Merchant Fleet. The Rogue Trader will build business relationships with them over the course of the entire game. The game also features a small number of special merchants who are not affiliated with these five factions.

The Rogue Trader can procure various items of interest from several factions in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The key dealers you will encounter in the game are representatives from one of five factions: the Drusians, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission, the Fellowship of the Void, and the Imperial Navy. The Rogue Trader will build business relationships with them over the course of the entire game. The game also features a small number of special merchants who are not affiliated with these five factions.

languages.text: Der Freihändler kann verschiedene wichtige Gegenstände von mehreren Fraktionen in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} beziehen. Die wichtigsten Handeltreibenden, die dir im Spiel begegnen werden, sind Repräsentanten einer von fünf Fraktionen: die Drusianer, die Entdecker, die Kasballica-Mission, die Gefährten der Leere und die Imperiale Kriegsflotte. Der Freihändler wird zu ihnen über den gesamten Spielverlauf Geschäftsbeziehungen aufbauen. Das Spiel beinhaltet außerdem eine kleine Anzahl an besonderen Händlern, die nicht mit diesen fünf Fraktionen in Verbindung stehen.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader can procure various items of interest from several factions in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The key dealers you will encounter in the game are representatives from one of five factions: the Drusians, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission, the Fellowship of the Void, and the Imperial Navy. The Rogue Trader will build business relationships with them over the course of the entire game. The game also features a small number of special merchants who are not affiliated with these five factions.

traits.locale_text: Der Freihändler kann verschiedene wichtige Gegenstände von mehreren Fraktionen in der Koronus-Ausdehnung beziehen. Die wichtigsten Handeltreibende, die dir im Spiel begegnen werden, sind Repräsentanten einer von fünf Fraktionen: die Drusianer, die Exploratoren. die Kasballica-Mission, die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefährten{/g} der Leere und die Händlerflotte. Der Freihändler wird zu ihnen über den gesamten Spielverlauf Geschäftsbeziehungen aufbauen. Das Spiel beinhaltet außerdem eine kleine Anzahl an besonderen Händlern, die nicht mit diesen fünf Fraktionen in Verbindung stehen.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} peut se procurer des objets susceptibles de l'intéresser auprès de plusieurs factions des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Les principaux marchands que vous rencontrerez dans le jeu sont des représentants de l'une des cinq factions suivantes : les Drusiens, les Explorators, la Mission de la Kasballica, la Communauté du Vide et la Marine Impériale. Le libre-marchand nouera des relations commerciales avec ceux-ci tout au long du jeu. Le jeu propose également un petit nombre de marchands spéciaux non affiliés à ces cinq factions.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader can procure various items of interest from several factions in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The key dealers you will encounter in the game are representatives from one of five factions: the Drusians, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission, the Fellowship of the Void, and the Imperial Navy. The Rogue Trader will build business relationships with them over the course of the entire game. The game also features a small number of special merchants who are not affiliated with these five factions.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} peut se procurer des objets susceptibles de l'intéresser auprès de plusieurs factions des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Les principaux marchands que vous rencontrerez dans le jeu sont des représentants de l'une des cinq factions suivantes : les Drusiens, les Explorators, la Mission de la Kasballica, la Communauté du Vide et la Marine Impériale. Le libre-marchand nouera des relations commerciales avec ceux-ci tout au long du jeu. Le jeu propose également un petit nombre de marchands spéciaux non affiliés à ces cinq factions.

languages.text: 行商浪人可以从{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的几个派系中获得各种各样的物品。 您在游戏中遇到的所有商人，都来自于以下五个派系之一：圣德鲁苏斯教会、真理开拓者、卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团、虚空协联，以及帝国海军。行商浪人会在游戏过程中与这些派系建立业务关系。 此外，游戏中还有少数不属于任何派系的特殊商人。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader can procure various items of interest from several factions in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The key dealers you will encounter in the game are representatives from one of five factions: the Drusians, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission, the Fellowship of the Void, and the Imperial Navy. The Rogue Trader will build business relationships with them over the course of the entire game. The game also features a small number of special merchants who are not affiliated with these five factions.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人可以从{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的几个派系中获得各种各样的物品。 您在游戏中遇到的所有商人，都来自于以下五个派系之一：圣德鲁苏斯教会、真理开拓者、卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团、虚空协联，以及帝国海军。行商浪人会在游戏过程中与这些派系建立业务关系。 此外，游戏中还有少数不属于任何派系的特殊商人。

languages.text: ローグトレーダーは{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}のいくつかの勢力から様々なアイテムを購入できる。 プレイヤーがゲーム内で出会う重要な商人は5つの勢力、つまりドルスス派、エクスプロレイター、カスバリカ聖務団、虚空の仲間、そして帝国海軍の代表者である。ゲーム全体を通して、ローグトレーダーは彼らと取引関係を築く。 ゲームにはまたこれらの5つの勢力とは提携関係にない特殊な商人が少数ながら存在する。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader can procure various items of interest from several factions in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The key dealers you will encounter in the game are representatives from one of five factions: the Drusians, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission, the Fellowship of the Void, and the Imperial Navy. The Rogue Trader will build business relationships with them over the course of the entire game. The game also features a small number of special merchants who are not affiliated with these five factions.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーはコロヌス・エクスパンスのいくつかの勢力から様々なアイテムを購入できる。 プレイヤーがゲーム内で出会う重要な商人は5つの勢力、つまりドルスス派、エクスプロレイター、カスバリカ聖務団、虚空の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}仲間{/g}、そして通商船団の代表者である。ローグトレーダーはゲーム全体を通して彼らと取引関係を築いていくことになる。 また、少数ながらこれらの5つの勢力とは提携関係にない特殊な商人が存在する。

languages.text: Tu Comerciante Independiente puede conseguir artículos de interés procedentes de distintas facciones de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Los mercaderes más relevantes con los que te toparás en tu aventura formarán parte de una de esas cinco facciones: los drusianos, los exploradores, la Misión Kasballica, la Hermandad del Vacío y la Armada Imperial. Tu Comerciante Independiente entablará relaciones comerciales con ellas a lo largo de la aventura. Por su parte, también existe un número reducido de mercaderes especiales que no rinden cuentas a ninguna de las cinco facciones anteriores.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader can procure various items of interest from several factions in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The key dealers you will encounter in the game are representatives from one of five factions: the Drusians, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission, the Fellowship of the Void, and the Imperial Navy. The Rogue Trader will build business relationships with them over the course of the entire game. The game also features a small number of special merchants who are not affiliated with these five factions.

traits.locale_text: Tu Comerciante Independiente puede conseguir artículos de interés procedentes de distintas facciones de la Extensión de Koronus. Los mercaderes más relevantes con los que te toparás en tu aventura formarán parte de una de esas cinco facciones: los drusianos, los exploradores, la Misión Kasballica, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Hermandad{/g} del Vacío y la Flota Mercante. Tu Comerciante Independiente entablará relaciones comerciales con ellas a lo largo de la aventura. Por su parte, también existe un número reducido de mercaderes especiales que no rinden cuentas a ninguna de las cinco facciones anteriores.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'ndeki farklı fraksiyonlardan işine yarayacak çeşitli eşyalar tedarik edebilir. Oyunda karşılaşacağın kilit tüccarlar beş fraksiyondan birinin temsilcileridir: Drususçular, Keşiftörler, Kasballica Misyonu, Uçsuz Kardeşliği ve İmparatorluk Donanması. Hür Tacir olarak tüm oyun boyunca bu fraksiyonlarla iş ilişkileri kuracaksın. Oyunda ayrıca bu beş fraksiyondan hiçbirine tabi olmayan az sayıda özel tüccarla da karşılaşacaksın.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader can procure various items of interest from several factions in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The key dealers you will encounter in the game are representatives from one of five factions: the Drusians, the Explorators, the Kasballica Mission, the Fellowship of the Void, and the Imperial Navy. The Rogue Trader will build business relationships with them over the course of the entire game. The game also features a small number of special merchants who are not affiliated with these five factions.
